title: HIGH-CORP CASE POSTPONED TO JANUARY 14
content: November 30, 2010: A decision has been reached to postpone the Hi-Corp financial fraud case, which was filed at the High Court against former Army Commander Sarath Fonseka and his son-in-law Danuna Thilakaratne, to the 14th of January. This decision was taken based on the agreement reached between the lawyers appearing for the plaintiff and…
